channel.title: Walkthrough on Fleming Systems LLC
channel.description: Recent content in Walkthrough on Fleming Systems LLC

item.title: Starting Out
item.description: Starting out with Fleming Systems I had never really considered starting a business of my own… granted this is a company of me, myself, and I. But I have learned quite a bit since I first started two weeks ago, to include legally and technically. Legally, there are a few things I had to do. I learned how to form my own LLC and register it with the state of Washington.
